title: An Evening with Placido
brief_description: This remarkable gala charity performance was recorded live at Wembley Arena in London, in aid of Save The Children (UK and Mexico). Recapture this magical event as Placido Domingo, arguably the world’s greatest tenor, performs his most popular and favourite Arias and Operettas. Music is provided by The English Chamber Orchestra and Placido is joined in performance by Mezza Soprano Marta Senn and Eduard Tomagian. Included are works from Puccini, Verdi, Gimenez, Giordano, Lehar, Sozobal, and Soutullo Y Vert.
